Romero’s first entry into that particular camp called ‘Night Of The Living Dead’ spawned nine additional movies, as well as several popular theatrical sequels by other filmmakers. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen and ancient race: The Modoc Tribe. Unfortunately for our heroes, they have already awoken something buried deep beneath their very feet, and now have no way out but to escape being someones dinner.
